p: Corrosion potential (Ecorr) measured at the end of immersion period in all solutions is presented in Table 1 and Table 2. Results showed that more negative Ecorr values are related to higher fluoride concentrations. The difference in Ecorr obtained in the lowest F- concentration (0.1%) and the highest F- concentration (1%) was -1102mV. Figure 1 shows polarisation curves in different fluoride concentrations.
